mapper.select: select XuatChieu.Stt, XuatChieu.MaPhim,XuatChieu.GiaXuatChieu , PhongChieu.TenPhong, Phim.TenPhim, NgayChieu.Ngay, NgayChieu.GioBatDau, PhongChieu.MaCN, ChiNhanh.TenCN from XuatChieu join PhongChieu on PhongChieu.MaPhong = XuatChieu.MaPhong join Phim on Phim.MaPhim = XuatChieu.MaPhim join NgayChieu on NgayChieu.Stt = XuatChieu.Ngay join ChiNhanh on ChiNhanh.MaCN = PhongChieu.MaCN
mapper.insert: insert into xuatchieu(GiaXuatChieu,Ngay,MaPhong,MaPhim) values(cast(#{giaXuatChieu} as float),cast (#{ngay} as int),#{maPhong},#{maPhim});
mapper.select: select xuatchieu.stt as stt_xc,ngaychieu.stt,phongchieu.tenphong,ngaychieu.ngay,ngaychieu.giobatdau,phim.tenphim,phim.maphim,phim.hinh,phim.thoiluong from ngaychieu join xuatchieu ON xuatchieu.ngay = ngaychieu.stt join phim on phim.maphim = xuatchieu.maphim join phongchieu on phongchieu.maphong = xuatchieu.maphong join chinhanh on chinhanh.macn = phongchieu.macn where ngaychieu.ngay=cast (#{ngay} as date) and chinhanh.macn=#{macn}
